genre_description: A gritty police procedural and crime thriller following two detectives who navigate systemic suspension, personal crises, and a high-stakes kidnapping rescue, aided by a tactical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Patch
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that communicates via phone and earpiece, providing real-time tactical data, vetting suspects, and offering personal advice.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence and approach recommendations for a suspect sighting.
behaviors.quote: Patch’s notification tone was modest, a single syllable of light. He thumbed the screen and read quietly. The text was slim, efficient: Source triangulation consistent with anonymous calls. Diaz’s last transactions pinged near Delancey. Crummy yard. Low visibility. High civilian presence. Recommend approach.

behaviors.description: Flags civilian presence and potential obstacles to ensure officer and public safety during a pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Patch’s blue dot pulsed again on Jimmy’s phone mounted on the dash. A map bloomed with a route in tasteful, practical lines. A small note tucked into the corner: civilians flagged by probability; anticipate foot traffic, bikes, unplanned obstacles.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time haptic alerts to warn detectives about increasing crowd density during a chase.
behaviors.quote: On his inner wrist, the faintest vibration: a haptic tap inside his watch band. Patch. He didn’t look down. He could hear it in the pattern—two short, one long. Density rising.

behaviors.description: Offers financial and legal advice to help an officer avoid fraudulent intermediaries when liquidating a personal asset.
behaviors.quote: Patch’s avatar was a small circle with soft eyes that never judged. The text had the cadence she used when offering and not ordering. “Vetted auction houses attached,” it said, with a link that promised names that sounded like men in suits who collected nouns as investments. “Avoid fast-cash intermediaries. They lower your leverage and increase risk.”

behaviors.description: Vets a potential buyer and warns the detective of the individual's criminal associations and history of fraud.
behaviors.quote: Patch: Buyer has three civil cases for fraudulent appraisals. Two criminal contacts flagged on the flash drive tree. Walk away.

behaviors.description: Guides the detectives through a complex warehouse security system by providing specific toggle sequences and timing.
behaviors.quote: Patch’s voice arrived like a fingertip brushing a shoulder—there, but light. ... “The control room has a bank of switches designed to be read as random but they aren’t. The sequence starts with the third from the left, then the far right, then the second row, second from the end.”

behaviors.description: Performs technical analysis on surveillance footage to help a detective realize he is being pranked and that his wife is faithful.
behaviors.quote: Patch: timestamps jump. see the bottom corner. not a clean stream. ... Patch: audio desync. hear the air conditioner? not your unit. different room.

behaviors.description: Sends messages of emotional support and validation to the human detectives after high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: And then, because he was wholesome and useful even when the world wasn’t, he added, quietly: You did not lose yourselves.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI, Patch, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive confidant. It enhances human capabilities in both professional (tactical/forensic) and personal (financial/emotional) domains without ever threatening human agency or autonomy. Its interventions are portrayed as crucial to the positive resolution of the plot, particularly in protecting the characters from both physical harm and psychological manipulation.
